text: The Fresh Film Festival is an event for children in Limerick, Ireland. They learn about things related to movies. This is a long-running festival that began in 1997. The festival wants children to learn to make movies. ==Other websites== Fresh Film Festival Official Site Category:Movie festivals Category:Limerick Category:Festivals in Ireland Category:1997 establishments in Europe Category:1990s establishments in the Republic of Ireland
title: Fresh Film Festival (Ireland)
